item.title: Statistical Mechanics
item.description: These lecture notes provide an in-depth treatment of Statistical Mechanics, linking macroscopic thermodynamic properties to microscopic behaviors through probability theory. Topics include classical ensembles, phase transitions, and applications in condensed matter physics.
